job.title: Machine learning Data Engineer
job.description:
Machine LearningData Engineer

Long-Term Contract

Cincinnati, Ohio

You will havethe opportunity to work on challengingMachine Learningand AIprojects with the goal to improve the everyday life ofclient’smembers.You willcollaborate with data scientist, analyst, business and IT teams todesign,implement, and deployMachine Learning and AIservices using Python,PySpark,Azure services,Databricks, Terraform,and other open-source software.Develop plans, designs, code,anddocumentation,andtoperformcode reviews,testing, anddebugging.You will embrace and enforce best practices in our data science community withautomated,repeatable data pipelines.

Some examples of how we add capabilities toMachine Learning Platforminclude:

·Creating templates for data scientists, embracing leading-edge modeling techniques

·Establishing a Feature Store with tens of thousands of features available to use in predictive models

·Defining monitoring, auditing, data lineage, and dependency tracking for data pipelines to improve quality

·Integrating ethical AI bias monitoring and drift analysis into modelling processing

·Standardizing the definitions of clinical, financial, and actuarial features for use across the business

Tools used

·Python, PySpark,Azure Databricks

· Azure Data Factory,?Azure DevOps,?Azure Kubernetes Service,CosmosDB, AppInsights, Kafka,?Pulsar

·Terraform

·Open-source ML software, likeSciKitLearn,SparkML,TensorFlow,Horovod,Petastorm

Job Description

·Build and deployML modelson Azure, using best practices in security, and Azure services

·Understand best practices for effective predictive models, including cluster management and algorithms, and evangelize with Humana Data Scientists

·Thrivein a fast-paced agile environment, closely interacting with businessanalysts,software engineers, machine learning scientists, data engineers, and data scientists

·Put together production templates, review and test ML code, and deploy it toProduction

Role Requirements

·BS in Computer Science or related field

·3+ years of experience working on cloud platforms– Azurepreferred

·5+ years of experience withMachine Learningand AI

·5+ years of software development experience, withsignificantPython experience

·Solid knowledge of data structures and algorithms

·Experience in production environments (ideally enterprise level).Directly responsible for creating productionjobs

·Abilityto learn new technologies and comprehendunfamiliardata domains and business processesquickly

Role Desirables

·Open-source contributions and portfolio of shipped code at GitHub

·Experience with Azure, particularly Azure Data Factory (ADF), Spark, Git, and other software engineering tools;

·Experience working with data scientists to streamline code, implement reliable production processes to score models, and/or building scalable, efficient processes to derive newdata

·Familiar withhealthcare applications, terminologies, and data

·Passion projects with ML/AI/NLP, for exampleKaggle competitions and Hackathons

RoleBonus

·Working multiple tools together on the Azure platform (Databricks, ADF, AppInsights and other monitoring/logging tools) to deploy to production;

·Experience in an enterprise production environment where they have hardened, refactored or otherwise improved upon the training code from DataScientists
